short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Anime Wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD Anime background. Anime wallpaper background theme for fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Automatically shuffle Anime wallpapers every time you open a new tab.
2. Customize your Anime background by either randomizing it or favoriting it in the wallpaper selection panel.
3. Integrated Google search bar for convenient browsing.
4. Swift access to your emails and social media accounts.
5. Display current date and time seamlessly.
6. Utilize the New Note feature for task organization.
7. Effortlessly navigate to your most visited websites.
8. Access your bookmarks with ease.
9. Add websites to the Shortcut panel for quick retrieval.
10. Instant access to Google apps.
11. Explore More Themes quickly.
12. Share content easily to social media platforms.
13. Quickly download wallpapers with just a click.
14. Swiftly access and play games.
15. Enjoy fun animations such as snow, rain, falling leaves, and fireworks in the Anime new tab experience.
